ProjectTitle: Modulation of pattern separation of emotional information by physical exercise and its relevance to psychopathology
InitialFeedbackHistory: 23/06/2022 Please note that the UZL ethical committee recommends 25 years of data preservation. [REDACTED] you use repositories for data sharing and preservation such as KU [REDACTED] RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) where you can keep your data under restricted access if needed to protect the privacy of the participants, or you can consider a domain specific repository, are for example ebrains or openneuro useful for your work, (https://ebrains.eu/; https://openneuro.org/)?
